attributes.action: MP's must vote on whether or not to activate Article 50.
attributes.background: The House of Commons must vote to decide if article 50 should be activated or not. Leaving the EU will be permanent and there is no going back. The referendum was advisory and Parliament must make the final decision.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
